job_title: Sr Director Business Development at Ascension in Austin, TX
job_description:
What You Will Do Direct business development strategic business operations. Evaluate applicability of leading edge technologies and use information to influence business strategies. Oversee operations to provide high quality cost effective services. Responsible for relationship building in an effort to establish partnerships and affiliations. Identify conventional and non-conventional growth opportunities that will lead to additional volume and revenue, improving strategic positioning in the market place. Design and prioritize the strategic growth opportunities within the organization. What You Will Need Education:
Bachelor's degree required. Master's degree preferred. Work
Experience:
7 years of experience required. 10 years of experience preferred. 5 years of leadership or management experience preferred.
Salary Range:
$200K -- $250K
Minimum Qualification
Sales Management & Operations, Business DevelopmentEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.

Responsibilities: What You Will Do Direct business development strategic business operations
Evaluate applicability of leading edge technologies and use information to influence business strategies
Oversee operations to provide high quality cost effective services
Responsible for relationship building in an effort to establish partnerships and affiliations
Identify conventional and non-conventional growth opportunities that will lead to additional volume and revenue, improving strategic positioning in the market place
Design and prioritize the strategic growth opportunities within the organization
